snippet: Mayor Rahm Emanuel’s plan to spend nearly $150 million to encourage more bike-riding in the city has drawn concerns over where the money will be spent.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Rahm Emanuel’s plan to spend nearly $150 million to encourage more bike-riding in the city has drawn concerns over where the money will be spent.

headline.main: City Bike Plan Is Accused of a Neighborhood Bias
headline.seo: Chicago Bike Plan Accused of Neighborhood Bias
headline.print_headline: City Bike Plan Is Accused Of a Neighborhood Bias
